website_summaries.verdict: A unique mattress option from Linenspa that offers a more supportive feel than other options.
pros: Unique latex material and foam combination balances the flex and firmness of the mattress, providing a good middle-ground option for people seeking the best of both worlds
cons: Harder mattress feel than pure gel and foam mattresses
May cause slight aches or pains

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bed! I'm 6'1" 230lbs and feel like I'm floating. Easy enough to get out of the bag and "inflate" Will update review as time goes on 5 months later: mattress still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Affordable mattress- nothing to be suspicious about; it’s a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been complaining about her back hurting and not sleeping well through the night. My husband and visited a mattress store and we were shocked to see how expensive it can be. My husband went online and came across this mattress. He read all of the reviews and decided to take a chance and made the purchase. First night she woke up a few times; however, she now sleeps throughout the night and has not complained of any back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie & Yvonne Knott

customer_reviews.title: Not close to firm - never fully expanded
customer_reviews.text: Once again, the reviews failed me on this product. The mattress is very bouncy and it sinks in from top to bottom. This feels like a cheap mattress and it never uniformly expanded after 3 days. It's not firm, med-firm or anything close. It's more like very little cushion on top, and loose and bouncy below. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: aces_high

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: We've slept on this mattress for a while now and it remains very comfortable. An excellent value, and I wake up well rested. My hubby no longer wakes up running for a heating pad for his back in the morning, so for us this mattress is a vast improvement over our old traditional mattress! Set up was easy, and it took our king about three hours to fully expand. It is med firm, and is everything we hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.author: ccwie

customer_reviews.title: Order this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a researcher. I scoured the internet looking foran awesome bed that wouldn't break the bank. I was debating between the 10 in and 12 in Linenspa. After reading the reviews, we went with the 10 inch. Super easy to unroll. I helped the inflation along by gently lifting the corners a few times. Fully expanded in a few hours, and it was so comfortable, I got the best night's sleep in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Littmann

customer_reviews.title: Black Spots, Maybe Mold?
customer_reviews.text: I received my package on the correct date, but once I opened it up to let it decompress and inflate I noticed all these black spots on the front side of the mattress. I emailed linenspa to receive product support 10 days ago and still haven't received a single reply. Haven't even tested out the mattress, but just looking at it I already regret shelling out the money- would've preferred to get just a full memory foam instead of this dirty and flimsy mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to different twin xlongs to see which we liked better, and so far both are keepers
customer_reviews.text: Was worried that the comfort level would be as low as the price, but I was wrong! This is fabulous! Purchased to different twin xlongs to see which we liked better, and so far both are keepers. Two different brands are shown in the picture, but as you can see, when covered they look just the same. Using with an adjustable base, they work very well with the base. This is the Good Stuff, no need to over spend to have real comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Coast Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Concrete bed...
customer_reviews.text: My back is killing me, sleepless nights, unrested miserable days at work. I thought this would be the one but, it is rock hard, never softened out. I am miserable, one month is not enough for return window, I needed more time to see if it will softened out but still rock hard like day one, I feel like sleeping on concrete
customer_reviews.author: F1KR3T

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for a Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this mattress very quickly! Came vacuumed sealed in a heavy plastic wrap. (Be careful cutting it open, so you don’t cut the actual mattress). After opening, mattress start to rise immediately. After a little while, we pulled up a little on each of the four corners of the mattress bc it seemed like it was stuck. After that, we chose to stay off the mattress for almost 24hrs before laying on it. So far, my husband and I really like it. Very comfortable and the price can’t be beat!! We put ours on a platform bed so no box spring was needed. Definitely would recommend this mattress for anyone who may be interested! I doubt you’ll regret it!
customer_reviews.author: ENHill

customer_reviews.title: Sunk in mattress! You can feel the springs
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mattress after reading the reviews. My husband took it out of the box and we let in rise for 24 hours. The center is sunk in and you can feel the springs when laying on it. I’d return it but that’s the problem with a box. I will be reaching out to see what can be done. Hopefully customer service will be helpful. I will update once I’m in contact with customer service
customer_reviews.author: Mstahl

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Middle of the mattress concaves and it is highly uncomfortable. I will be buying a name brand mattress mere months after this tragic purchase. Way too soft and overall poor quality. Nearly impossible to return via the shipping method so proved itself an unavoidable scam.
customer_reviews.author: JP Dad

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Expands fully by 48 hrs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage grandson when he visits. Easy set up. I allowed it to expand for 48 hrs to be sure. I am very sensitive to mattress comfort and prefer soft with a firm under support but I think this would be too soft for me. However my grandson is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Firm yet soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Great matress! Glad I finally decided on this mattress from linenspa. It is soft and firm, just what i was looking for. And I did a lot of looking and research and reviews till my eyes were crossed. It has springs but you cant even hear or feel them. I was worried about it being too soft as my Serta pillow top gave me very bad aches and pains. But the top on this is latex so its firmer, no sinking to the bottom. Recommend very much. Btw. It took a few days to fully expand - worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured. Not Flat but Humped in Center with Dropped Corners.
customer_reviews.text: Unless someone here quickly offers a solution to the problems with the mattress I got its going back. It just is not FLAT like the pictured one. It's humped in the center with sunken corners. Just compare my bed (pictured) to the picture in the ad. I have given the bed 5 days with some gentle pressure to ensure the foam is fulyl expanded but it has not changed the beds shape. I need a flat bed that does jot roll me to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Non De Plume

customer_reviews.title: Great bed at an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 1 month, and so far it’s been phenomenal!! Very comfortable and cool! In between firm and plush! Will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but needs better edge support.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is very comfortable. The only thing that I wish was better was the edge support. One tends to roll off when you near the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bed for a month now and it’s been a game changer. We had it the last couple of weeks of my pregnancy and I really wish we had bought it sooner. It did take 12 hours to “inflate” fully, but once it was completely setup, it has been wonderful. All of our hip and back issues magically disappeared after sleeping in this bed. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for lower back- NOT firm NOT supportive
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for 10 months or so and it dips in the middle. I woke up with the worst back pain ever with this mattress. Do not purchase if looking for a firm supportive bed. It is soft and feels like it would be super comfy for someone who didn’t need support. The fact they use the word “supportive” in the description really is false advertising. Also it is extremely heavy and getting it upstairs to unwrap and inflate was ridiculous. I recently gave it to my daughter to try since it didn’t work for me and much heavier and harder to move than her mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia love

customer_reviews.title: Back pain gone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time, in great shape, expanded quickly and sleeps great. I was overwhelmed with looking at mattresses so I just ordered one that wasn't totally cheap and that had great reviews. If it stays this was for 2 years I will be very happy. Great for back sleeping, a little stiff so far on the side. My back pains are almost gone. Thank you Linenspa. I'm that guy that tried sleeping on top of pillows, on top of rolled up gel mattress covers, etc until now I finally got this. TBH I had to wait for community spring cleaning day so I could get rid of my mattress. Disposal is quite expensive in NJ.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kline

customer_reviews.title: 1st one good, 2nd one bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these several months ago for our vacation house and loved it the few times I slept on it so I purchased another for our primary house... Huge difference! The first one expanded quickly within ~10hrs, had good shape and was comfortable. The second one I bought took 4 days to expand to a barely acceptable shape. The corners and edges were droopy and squashed. The whole top looked like a dome shape. The edge support is nothing like the first mattress I purchased. We're sleeping on for now and will decide closer to the 100 day if we're going to return it... I sure hope they make good on that guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: SticNmove

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than advertised
customer_reviews.text: My California king is 80” long by 72” wide when it should be 84”x72” or if it’s a king 80x76. It’s fine for comfort but already sagging after less than a month on one side. I’m 6’ 180lbs so not a giant. Probably going to return based on these factors.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because my old fully memory foam mattress was losing its structure. both my boyfriend and I have bad backs so we decided to get something that had more support. It definitely has the support we need and the latex foam is wonderful it definitely has that push back feeling so we don’t sink in.we put on a topper to give it just a little bit more cushion and it’s so comfortable.i hope it will last for a good amount of years but for the price even if we only get 3-4 years it is definitely worth buying.im very satisfied.it unpacked easily and inflated evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where comfort meets price
customer_reviews.text: No frills memory foam mattress. Tremendous value for money. I weigh over 400 and my wife is overweight and this bed has offered us great sleep, and shows no signs of wear of or bowing of any kind, after over 2 months. Our previous mattress was also a Linen Spa and we loved it, we moved it into the guest room, when we upgraded to this king size. We paired with a heavy duty steel frame and steel box spring
customer_reviews.author: Runningoutofspace

customer_reviews.title: THIS ISN'T A MEDIUM FIRM MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: This mattress isn't any kind of firm. I just wasted close to $300 on this junk. After just six months it has completely collapsed into a worthless pile of jello. Now I have to throw away a six month old mattress. I couldn't give this thing away to a homeless person. I bought a memory foam mattress from Walmart that lasted seven years but this thing couldn't last six months? My back is killing me from sleeping on it. I had to go buy a self inflating air mattress, and I have to set it up every night, until I can find a real mattress. NEVER NEVER NEVER AGAIN AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: professorchaos

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable mattress for its price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mattress for its price. Two months after purchase it's still solid like the first week. Perfect for mostly-side-sleepers like myself. I'll never spend $1000 on a mattress again knowing high quality mattresses like this one exist for so cheap. Highly recommend! As a side note: My roommate bought a pure foam mattress from a Chinese brand here on Amazon (one of the top sellers, costs less than this one), and I prefer my Linenspa mattress a lot over his. Although comfortable, his mattress still has a residual mold-like smell two weeks later (luckily it's a much weaker smell than in the first few days), and I can tell from the corners his mattress didn't fully 'expand'.
customer_reviews.author: Joao Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Good in a hospital bed frame (moves to multiple positions easily) - good support, and a cushion
customer_reviews.text: This mattress works within a hospital bed frame, bends with the frame great! Mattress is supporting a person at 320 lbs at 6'2" tall. It's firm enough to allow sitting without the compression of the mattress to the point where one can feel coils or pressure under the sacral area, unlike standard hospital mattress! It's soft enough to allow a cushion feeling, but smooth enough to allow for a person to be moved easily. This mattress has provided pain relief compared with the standard hospital bed mattress. Was left out of the box for one day before placement in the bed frame, no off-gassing experienced. Standard linens fit it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Firm, butt not too firm
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying a mattress online. I looked at some you tube reviews and decided to go with this one. i like the firmness of this mattress. it's soft, but you don't sink like some gel/foam mattresses. i'm a 240 pound body builder/side sleeper and this has been great so far. I've been sleeping really well on it. Only time will tell how long it will last. I bought the king size.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mattress
customer_reviews.text: A real simple way to purchase a new mattress! It is truly Med-Firm. It fits on top of my 3 inch separated slates of my platform bed. I turn (rotate) it once a month. It cannot be flipped over. I bought the mattress cover with it...however the mattress cover is for the 12 inch thick mattress. But it works! Update....almost a year later and love this mattress! I don't want to get out of bed sometimes in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just received
customer_reviews.text: So we just got this mattress in last night, seemed good, no sleeping problems. If you will just slit the box up the side then the mattress will unfold on top of the cardboard box and you will not need to pull it out of the box which I see frustrates so many. Shipping quick. After having our other mattress for only 1.5 yrs it pitted and we found ourselves in a hole, not big people and a $2500 king mattress. We are giving a cheaper mattress a try and if it only lasts a couple of years, we are still ahead of the game.
customer_reviews.author: OBARR2

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: i shopped around on amazon extensively doing research and combing thru reviews to try and find the best mattress for the price, and this one did not disappoint! firm enough so my partner & I no longer suffer with back issues and soft enough so that it isn't uncomfortable. Highly recommend this hybrid mattress! Luckily I was able to snag the cali king while it was on sale, but even the normal price would be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Elizabeth Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great blend of softness and firmness!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the price, The bed feels really soft but supports you as well. I'm about 220lbs and I mostly sleep on my side, and I feel great. It also expands pretty fast. It may take a full 24hrs or more for it to fully expand, but within a few hours it is expanded enough to be able sleep on comfortably. A lot of other mattresses take forever to expand, which can be annoying if you want to go to sleep in a few hours. My gf just replaced her foam mattress with this one because the foam mattress didn't expand fully even after a week and it didn't offer enough support. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gilbeaux

customer_reviews.title: 100% happy!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this mattress for one night, but or first impression is awesome! I slept great and was extremely comfortable all night long. The foam top does not get hot at all and the bed is very supportive and plush at the same time. I read other reviews that said that there was a chemical smell to the mattress, but ours didn't at have that at all. I am more than pleased with this purchase so far, but if something changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Myers

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of days, but it finally reached it's full size. Most comfortable mattress I've ever had! I used to have back soreness in the morning and it has been greatly reduced!
customer_reviews.author: bigred1183

customer_reviews.title: Two Year Review: not worth the money or the time or hauling it up the stairs
customer_reviews.text: We have been complaining about this mattress for over a year. Even with rotation, it distorts. We both wake frequently. It has no motion isolation - at all. Forget about it if you have a dog or other human who jumps into bed. It's horribly uncomfortable, and I truly wish I had trusted my instinct that the price was too good to be true. When you're reading the reviews, look for those that have had the mattress for at least a year or more. I'm writing this so maybe someone can avoid buying this. It's a great price - maybe for a guest bedroom that's rarely used, but not as a daily sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bivins

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it. Make a better investment.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 2 years. It is my primary mattress and I am the only one sleeping on it. At first it was so comfortable. But by year 1, it started to sink in the middle pretty significantly. By year two, it's so sunken, it's painful to sleep on. Had to get a new mattress because of how uncomfortable it became. I am 5'1, 146 lbs. I have issues with chronic pain and this mattress only worsened it. Honestly, I would not waste your money on this mattress. Spend a little more and make a better investment because this mattress won't last more than 1.5 years tops.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say, I am well impressed with this mattress! I bought the full size & allowed it to fully expand by standing it on it’s side for almost 48 hours. I added a mattress topper I’ve had stored for extra cushion, but the mattress didn’t really need it. It is super comfy with just the right amount of firmness. I bought it for my daughter & now I want it! I nap on it every chance I get!
customer_reviews.author: texascher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really all that impressed, starting to sag in middle after one month use
customer_reviews.author: midwest

customer_reviews.title: It will take time with this mattress but be patient. It will pay off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in twin-xl about 6 months ago. At first I wasn't sure if it was right for me as I had a hard time getting used to it. I have a herniated disc in my neck and back. But it took a while but I really sleep well on this mattress now. I had previously slept on a latex mattress that wore out. I am very satisfied with this mattress. Just don't throw in the towel to quickly. You may need to add a 1" foam topper as it was a little stiff for me but it added just enough softness and I am sleeping wonderfully on it.
customer_reviews.author: chinchee

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Bed!
customer_reviews.text: So prior to this bed, I had an Ikea bed. It was "medium" firmness but ended up being so hard I had to purchase a mattress topper and even that didn't help to ease my comfort. After much hesitation, I decided to give this bed a try. SO MUCH BETTER! It came in an airtight wrap and took about half a day to rise to its full size. It's really really soft. I'm 230 lbs and it's perfect for me. If I were any larger I think It would need to be thicker hence why I shaved off a star.
customer_reviews.author: The Lady Who Loves Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand of mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a full for my kids bunk bed to try out. Loved falling asleep with them while reading, firm enough my back didn’t hurt, but seemed soft at the same time. Loved it so much, got the single for the top bunk and then bought another for our camper. Also tried the large pillows, love them too! One thing for sure I would note, open the box, or the package where you want the mattress. As soon as you open the plastic, it starts to inflate. It’s easier to just let it inflate where you want it then move them around.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Linse

customer_reviews.title: Quality& Price
customer_reviews.text: Love my new mattress. Very comfortable, outstanding quality for the price. Fast shipping. Point of reference-I am small person-100lbs. The combo of memory foam & wrapped coil springs is very effective. It gives the comfort of foam with the stability & support of springs. Best of both. No negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Casey &Ayla Gold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress..... For one person!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is one of the more comfortable mattresses that I've owned for sleeping alone! With two people however, you get a little bit of a problem where it caves more in the middle than on the edges, so you slightly feel like you're going to slide into the other person the whole night! It's not a big problem, and it doesn't cave a whole lot or anything like that, but it just ever so slightly does that it makes the mattress a lot less comfortable if you have two people laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian L

customer_reviews.title: To get a quality sleep, this mattress is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had our mattress for over a week now, it has done everything we read about, easy set up and the firmness is perfect in what we were looking fit, my husband and I don't have near the aches and pains we had from our other mattress of 4years. Would recommend anyone that needs to replace a broken down mattress and don't have a lot of money to spend this is excellent for the price and our backs are feeling better
customer_reviews.author: Jamie clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Sunk from middle. Waste of money. Check pictures before buying.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress sunk from the middle. I opened the box and allowed it to inflate for more than 36 hours. However, the middle portion never got inflated. I thought it may take it some more time to inflate, however after 1 week it is in the same condition. I feel like i m digging into the mattress all night. Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: shivang

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about a hybrid mattress or even one with latex foam because I've always had a traditional mattress. But this mattress really surprised me with it's comfort. We let ours rest for a whole day because the corners weren't popping up, as well as there was a latex smell to it. Anyone with a sensitive nose should give it time to air out. With that extra time the corners popped up as well. I feel the mattress is on the soft side for people who are used to traditional mattresses but maybe firmer for people who have used any of the foam mattresses before. All in all this turned out to be a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: The Mattress fits the Descrition
customer_reviews.text: The twin size mattress fits our twin mattress bed frame. The mattress fits the description, maybe a little more firm then I would think. It is firm and contours to your body. If you are looking for this type of mattress it will be a good fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lawyer (Phoenix, AZ)

customer_reviews.title: Decent,  but shorter than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: So, delivery was good. Typical mattress in a bag transport. I've slept on this a few nights. My first latex hybrid. Its fairly comfortable. Height is an exaggeration. After five days, it's still around 1.5 inches shorter than advertised. I'm pretty sure it will never reach advertised height.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is an absolute dream. I moved into my new place Saturday morning and despite the clear and concise instructions to unbox and allow to return to fullness for 24hrs before using both my gf and I slept in pure comfort on it the very same night. Amazing value for the money and now we are looking to purchase a second for the guest room. No smell. No odors. No disappointment in the least. If medium to firm is your comfort zone this IS your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the money. Purchased this for my step-son's room. It's comparable to my mattress, which was over a thousand dollars more expensive. Would highly recommend. Easy to unpackage.
customer_reviews.author: RG2015

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very comfortable. We went from memory foam to this and it is so much better. The temperature neutral latex makes sleeping in hot weather a breeze. We use these with our adjustable bed and they do just fine. I may buy more for the other beds in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ault

customer_reviews.title: Very firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is hard as a rock. I’m 5’10” 175 lbs. it is bouncy. I am a side sleeper and my hips do not sink into the mattress enough. I wake up with so much pain and had to go to the dr and physical therapy. If you are a back sleeper this may be good for you but I haven’t slept through the night since I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great.  Fine for a kid's bed.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 4-year old's twin bed. Like others have said, it never did expand completely. The ends were always a little bit squished down and never expanded. The mattress itself is very very soft and bouncy. I would not describe it as "medium" at all. I would not recommend this medium firmness for heavier adults. You'll just sink right to the bottom. Our daughter seems to like it though, and that's all that matters for now! All in all, not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm over a month in now and have been sleeping well on this mattress. For the price and the convenience of bed in a box, it seems to be a great value. I wanted a hybrid latex/spring because I don't like the deadening effect of memory foam, which forms a shape around the body and holds you stiffly in one position. The only downside is that the edges are very poorly supported so it feels like you lose about 6" of sleeping space around the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Brawndo

customer_reviews.title: Best night sleep on this firm mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is as described and even better. Firm but not hard, best night sleep we've had in a while. Will be buying mattresses for the kid next.
customer_reviews.author: Momtofive24/7

customer_reviews.title: size accuracy
customer_reviews.text: the mattresses as I bought two are fairly comfortable, but the size description is wrong they are only about 77 inches long instead of the 80 inch description. This makes your sheets and bed cover less tight, which in turn causing bunching and thus back pain. I would not recommend these mattresses to anyone with back trouble. I would return them but the process is to problem-some.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We were a bit skeptical buying a mattress on Amazon, but since it is for our guest room, we went for it. My son and d-i-l loved it! They slept on it a week and gave it a high review, so you can buy with confidence. We buy two twin X-Longs and put together like a king on two bed frames with king bedding. It just makes it easier to rearrange, and if we need two beds, they can easily convert.
customer_reviews.author: Bettamom

customer_reviews.title: Ok. But edges no support.
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent cheap mattress. However it was much more squishy than I thought it would be and in comparison to a previous box mattress I purchased. The edges have no stability.
customer_reviews.author: D. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for a week now, replacing a 20+ year old Serta full size that got saggy in the middle. Prior, I was always stiff in the mornings, and my two large dogs were hardly comfortable in a small space. A wheel broke on my old frame, so I decided it was time to bite the bullet and upgrade to a queen. I'm so lucky I found this mattress at this price point, paired with a new frame at that. I have slept so well in the last week. I wake up refreshed. I'm not stiff. My workouts since then have felt great. Very thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa N

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: For the price point and the comfort this is a great mattress! It’s freaking heavy and I could barely get the box in my house....ended up having 2 dudes carry it in. It’s pretty solid, I’ve moved it 3 times now and it has faired well! I really like the hybrid because it has support of springs, is less dense than full memory foam but still offers the softness of memory foam. I actually liked this so much that I purchased the same in a Queen for my spare bedroom 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I robbed somebody
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bed!! I laid on it and was jealous. For what I paid for it and the level of comfort I got out sleeping on it, I feel like I robbed somebody. My daughter barely let the thing inflate properly before she laid on it. A little softer than what she was used to but comfortable none the less. She lays on this thing and actually just cocoons down and passes out. Only took an hour for to inflate enough to lay on but by the next day it was perfect. No smell
customer_reviews.author: TLow

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable or Supported
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed, hopeful it would work for me. It has not. As a side sleeper, I have woken up with constant pain in my hips and neck. I added a mattress pad and that helped, but there is just not enough support. There is also no support to side on the side of the bed to dress or put on socks. It nearly flattens. I like the idea of a hybrid bed. I do not think this is the one for me and given the refund policy, I am likely to just put it in a guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, comfortable. The odor went away during the first day. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for unbelievable value!
customer_reviews.text: We had the matress that cost us 1k and after 3 months I have begun feeling back pain, I thought maybe it was something wrong with my back, so I consulted a doctor, she says everything is alright. Long story short, I cured after sleeping on this mattress. I could not believe it because the price is incomparable! Thank you for such a great product
customer_reviews.author: Olga K.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable! I sleep great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very comfortable. I bought this because I upgraded from a full to a twin bed. On my twin bed I had a memory foam mattress top and this mattress definitely doesn’t give you the same sink in feeling the topper did. It took some getting used to but was very comfortable when I did and I sleep great. My sister bought the memory foam version of this one and I think if you’re going for a softer feel this would be the way to go over that one.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I received this Friday and it is Sunday now and the darn thing is still not completely expanded. It is soft but the corners are like 5” thick. This mattress is no where near the 10” thick as advertised. Will keep you updated. Now Wednesday and it is still not expanded all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Enright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy for one person to carry. Get help to save frustration. After I got it out of the box, I strategically placed it on the platform so it would unroll into place. ( I thought I was very clever in doing so.) It worked! After 24 hours it was perfect. Great mattress for the money. Repeat customer. I bought a queen and later the king.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Daves

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We received the mattress this week, and tried it out this weekend. It is for our guest room, but we could sleep on it if we need to. The pillow top cushioning is nice and soft, but the mattress supports. Will update if that changes, but at this time, can recommend,
customer_reviews.author: B Grvs

customer_reviews.title: A nice mattress to replace your temperpedic with.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress to replace a temperpedic mattress we bought a year ago. Needless to say we spent a lot more on the earlier mattress which I found hot and my body would indent by morning. The linenspa mattress has been great. It provides support throughout the night and is very comfortable. I am truly enjoying it. Let’s see what it feels like in a year.
customer_reviews.author: RHG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress and waited 2 weeks for the ends to expand. The company replaced it. The new mattress is not expanding on the corners and I don't feel the side support on this mattress. Very inconsistant. Thinking of going with a different brand. The expanded center is extremely comfortable. I really wanted this bed to work out. Has great bounce and support. In the middle. 1 year later.. GREAT BED! Glad I gave it time. Only down side is it's so heavy. I cant just move my room around when I want, I need help.
customer_reviews.author: Melody F

customer_reviews.title: Lost support after less than one year
customer_reviews.text: To begin, I had high hopes for this matteress and it lived up to those hopes... for a brief period of time. Now, less than one year later, the matters has lost a significant amount of support and firmness and feels like I'm "sunken in" the matteress. I have rotated the mattress, which gave me a bit more support, but now I just have a big slope from firmer to super unsupportive. I guess you really do get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: cas101

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a year
customer_reviews.text: For about year, I found this this mattress (10 inch) to be incredibly comfortable; firm but soft and supportive, no back aches. I loved the comfort of this mattress... until it started sagging. I weigh 134, am not a large person, so I was disappointed that after one year, it needed replacing. I am glad I didn't pay too terribly much for it, although I am still bummed I have to buy a new one so soon. Won't be buying this one though.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Best mattress I have ever had! We live on the 3rd floor and it was delivered right to our door and was ready within a few hours. We unrolled it and bam, we had a mattress! We have used it for about 2 years now and it has some idea of where my husband and I sleep, but not too noticeable and still very comfortable for the both of us. Will definitely buy more for our other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes the bed
customer_reviews.text: My husband is SO picky about mattresses and he kind of likes this one. There will never be a mattress he loves but I bet this one comes close. I was a little hesitant to buy mattress online but very glad we made this choice. We would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great mattress! The box was small for a queen, but after I got it on the bed and gave it 24 hours it was looking great. We did give it 48 hrs before being on it to insure it was fully decompressed. It is just the right firm to softness for us. We like it so much we are looking into purchase more to replace mattresses that are lacking the same comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Musicmom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is pretty comfy..not all that plush but yet not too firm, however the middle of the mattress feels as if it comfomed to my body shape and hasn’t puffed back up the way it should’ve . I only waited about an hour or two before sleeping on it so I guess that’s the reason why. I suppose if you wait the recommended time before sleeping on it then that wouldn’t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daneisha

customer_reviews.title: Quality and safe shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I'm more upset the way the matress arrived, then with the actual product. Matress didnt come in a box. It arrived rolled up just in plastic. It was not at all well protected. It was filthy. For that much money, I expected better. This looked like it come from someones garage.
customer_reviews.author: JENS MALY

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough...but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mattress although its too soft for my liking. I'd rather a firmer mattress and this is not one. I'm 5'5" and 128 lbs and It sinks in way too much for me. It's better for a young child.
customer_reviews.author: Adria Garrido

customer_reviews.title: 1 year, collapsed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January of 2019, and it started to fail in March of 2019. Now this thing is a torture rack. I'm 6'0, 220, and I have been sleeping alone in the bed and it still failed. I lay on my side, pain, I lay on my back, pain; if I were to lay on my stomach, I'm sure I will become paralyzed the over night. I even try to lay on the side edges to have some support, and still pain. I honestly feel like this mattress has damaged my back, and I am thinking about taking legal action.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, not great for any back support.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress almost a year ago from today and it is not the greatest mattress as described in the reviews. It’ says it’s about 10 inches, but feels a bit shorter in height. The mattress is standard for sleeping in terms of sleeping cool or hot. It is not ideal for any type of back support. I’m mostly a back sleeper and I toss and turn throughout the night and wake up with extreme back pain. It’s more of a medium soft feel rather then the medium firm as stated. For the price point, it’s okay to just have for guests to sleep on, but it’s not worth it for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycz4a

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, with the pocket Springs, I feel well supported and do not have the back pain that I had on my all memory foam mattress that was only a few years old. Great price and highly recommended. The only downside is that the very edges of the mattress curve down slightly even whenever inflated to it maximum height.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie D. Ratliff II

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! It is so comfortable, better than our previous $4000 bed. I have waited 6 months to give a review and I am impressed. I weigh 295 and this is the way to go for us heavier people!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Many years ago staying someplace for a few months I slept on a mattress and did not get a back ache. I slept so well that ever since, I have wondered what kind of mattress that was. I tried a couple of foam mattresses. By the time I saw this I suspected that that mattress had been a natural rubber foam mattress. (Foam mattress can be made from petroleum or from the natural rubber of a rubber tree. They are both called latex but have very different properties.) This is a great mattress and is very comfortable. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, affordable mattress
customer_reviews.text: It’s by far my favorite bed I’ve ever owned! We bought this mattress because it was budget friendly & would arrive before a mattress ordered from a mattress store. Our old mattress has been through the ringer with 2 kids & 3 moves. Our first night on this mattress and we all fell asleep within 20 minutes of getting in bed. I’ve definjtelt recommended this mattress to a few friends and family who were looking for a quality, affordable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It unpacked and expanded in a few hours without any problems. Good quality, but too soft. It was described as "Medium Firm", but it feels way too soft. Softest mattress I ever slept on. It is extremely uncomfortable. I wake up in the middle of the night with achy muscles and have to stand and stretch for a few seconds. I feel like I'm sleeping IN the bed instead of ON the bed. I feel more comfortable sleeping on my carpeted floor, but the floor is cold and I'd rather sleep on a normal bed. At first I thought I could get used to it, but after a few weeks it still feels bad.
customer_reviews.author: Furball

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress hoping it would hold up under 200 lbs and not be too hot to sleep on. I've had mine for a year with no problems and this is my purchase of the exact same mattress for my 17-yr old son. When it came time to replace his mattress I didn't hesitate, I just ordered this one because after a full year of 200 lbs there's no heat, no dent and it still sleeps like I just bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Slade

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It was very comfortable, very smelly and I had a alergic reaction that made my eyes swell shut with hives all over my face and body. I had to take a week of work because I was too embarrassed to be seen after the alergic reaction. I returned it. I never knew I had several allergies until I bought this mattress. Its toxic waste.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched the world over and I have finally found the mattress I have been looking for. Pros: Very firm, yet very comfortable; Great for my lower back pain issue (I weigh 246 lbs, my wife weighs 146). I normally don't write reviews but I felt compelled to do so on this mattress. My advice: Buy it and give it a few days to totally expand upon opening it. It may be the best mattress you will ever own. We will have to wait and see about the longevity of the mattress but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had this about 3 weeks. Packaging was damaged but the product appeared unharmed. Definitely took 2 people ... Or a really strong person who's flexible to maneuver the box upstairs and unpack the mattress It took about 4 full days to inflate and become firm on the edges. The bed is firm and very good to accommodate a heavy person. We have a combined 700lb be weight on the mattress. I don't have any issues to report this far. I will update this review and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great support but....
customer_reviews.text: Great support, firm but cushy mattress. But after a year I gave it away to my granddaughter. It never fully expanded and even though it looked flat, the sides were slightly lower than the middle. It always felt like I was sliding off the bed or sleeping on a slant. This was a twin bed so it might be more pronounced than on a larger bed. If it was not for this issue I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best part is I now look forward to get in bed.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on other brands. The latex Foam with inner spring is the best choice from linenspa. I look forward every day to go back to sleep. I recommend to put it on top of a box spring for additional support. Highly Recommened.
customer_reviews.author: atau rehman

customer_reviews.title: Not what it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: This is only 9% latex mattress! It’s not a true hybrid mattress. Not to mention the chemical smell is horrible. I gave it a few days and it’s still just as strong as day 1. The most upsetting thing is the shock at seeing the make up of this mattress. Nothing natural about it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before all those weird bedbug reviews came out. I really dont know what prompted that cause my mattress arrived in perfect condition and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Shop for mattresses in person....
customer_reviews.text: This purchase reminded me why you should shop for mattresses in person. To begin with, this mattress is firmer than medium-firm. I actually had the weird sensation that the mattress was pushing back against my body weight -- it really bothered me. So, I laid a sleeping bag and a two inch foam mattress pad on top, which has made it comfortable. But, I don't think you should have to add accessories to make a bed comfortable.... For less than $200, i guess it's ok, but, to be honest, I was more comfortable just sleeping on an air mattress....
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mattress for a back sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I am a side sleeper and need a plusher mattress. It is temperature neutral and very comfortable like that. It is supportive, but not for the side sleeper. Remember that this review is a personal opinion of an older person who needs more cushion for the old bones.
customer_reviews.author: Audiomook

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with this mattress, especially the value! It is the perfect level of medium firmness. I was also very impressed with the packaging. It came condensed into a box but quickly expanded and was ready to go! We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: McCall Carson

customer_reviews.title: I cant replace the mattress in the package. I bought the wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but I made a mistake and ordered the wrong size. I opened the package and I am unable to repackage it. I needed a queen size not a king size so I bought a queen size to replace it. Now I have a king size mattress that I can't return because I already opened it. I ordered a cover to place it in, but I don't know what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: AVIS E RILEY

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your weight do the research
customer_reviews.text: Its hard but ok not my liking i like a softer bed. I think its the coils. But research dictates buying hybrid if your a heavier person
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was superfast and efficient. It been 12 hours since i opened the mattress and still is not halfway inflated. I'm going to have to sleep on the couch tonight and tomorrow rush somewhere else to get a new matress. It doesn't look like in the picture. Its thicker in the center and the corners have barely any support. I was kind of disappointed honestly . Updated on the matress Its been 4i hours and it still hasn't fully recovered. Im waiting for Amazon to pic it up to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been great so far (Updated 4/2020)
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying a mattress On-Line, but it's been great. The unpacking and "relaxing" aren't too bad (I did it alone). It only took about an hour or so to relax to full shape and dimensions. Update: 2 years of use and it's still holding up fine. Has developed any troughs or breakdown of edges where you'd normally sit. Noticed price increase though. I was lucky enough to get a Queen sized for $214 on a "Lightening Deal" sale.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: If you are skinny and sleep on your side, this might not be the best choice.
customer_reviews.text: The top is quite soft and with the added springs, you dont sink in too much like other foam mattresses. Although i found that my pain relief from sleeping on my spring mattress decreased by about 60%. (100% being no pain) A complete foam mattress might be better, but i dont like how you sink so much in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LINENSPA 10 Inch Latex Hybrid Mattress - Supportive - Responsive Feel - Medium Firm - Temperature Neutral - Twin
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Style Name:Mattress OnlyThe new LINENSPA 10 Inch Latex Hybrid Mattress offers that just-right medium-firm feel you have been looking for, and is perfect for back or stomach sleepers. With four layers of foam and latex, this mattress is responsive, supportive, and conforms to the natural curves of the body without the sink-in feel of memory foam. The mattress foundation consists of 7 inches of individually-encased steel coils that isolate movement while providing that familiar bounce we expect in a mattress. Complete with a classy two-tone cover, this mattress is perfect for the master bedroom or a cozy guest room. Plus, thanks to the generous 10-year warranty that protects against manufacturer defects, the LINENSPA 10 Inch Latex Mattress is designed to stand the test of time.
feature_bullets: Four layers of foam and latex give this mattress a supportive feel without being overly firm
Latex is temperature neutral, so this hybrid will sleep cooler than an all foam mattress
High-quality steel coils are individually wrapped for excellent motion isolation and encased in foam to provide edge support
Mattress comes compressed and rolled for shipping and easy setup
Backed by a 10-year warranty against manufacturer defects
100 NIGHT RISK-FREE TRIAL: IF YOU ARE UNSATISFIED WITH THIS MATTRESS, YOU ARE ELIGIBLE FOR A FULL REFUND UP TO 100 DAYS FROM DATE OF RECEIPT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars822 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 10-year u. S. Warranty guards against manufacturer defect.
